title: Rito needs to change the Ranked scoring system

replies.body: Do you ever get sick of posting your problems?

Nope, never. And I will keep posting them until Rito does something about MM. I had a game after this where I went 9/3, next best on my team was 2/2 and enemy was 3/7, or 1/3 depending on what you call 'good'.

It is a major problem when you are actually doing well from lane to end game, but lose because you get kids who can't co-ordinate a peanut butter jelly sandwich.
